articles.description: Former glamour model Jodie Marsh branded herself the 'world's biggest catfish' as she posed in a makeup-free mirror selfie shared with fans on Instagram
articles.content:
Jodie Marsh called herself the "world's biggest catfish" as she went makeup-free in a new mirror selfie shared with fans on Instagram.

articles.title: Love in the Caribbean! Lily Allen and husband David Harbour in St Barts - Daily Mail
articles.description: Lily Allen and David Harbour soaked up the sun off the coast of St. Barts. The 37-year-old singer-songwriter and her 47-year-old husband floated in a small boat in the shallow water.
articles.content:
Lily Allen and David Harbour soaked up the sun off the coast of St Barts on Wednesday afternoon.
